description: She is Shinkuro`s employer for which he would do anything for out of gratitude for her help when he was young and because he respects her completely. She a calm and collected person who goes with her intuition. On behalf of Murasaki`s mother last wish she took Murasaki out of the Inner Sanctuary and placed her in the care of Shinkuro who she believes is similar to her.
name: Juusawa Benika
